targets.query: SELECT last("value") * -1 + 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "mode" = 'idle' AND "cpu" = 'system' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "ram" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type" = 'used' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "disk_space" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type" = 'used' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type" = 'received' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "ram" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "type" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000)  FROM "load" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "avg" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000)  FROM "ctxt_switches" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000)  FROM "processes" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "type" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "mem_committed" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "io" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "operation" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "disk_ops" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "operation" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "disk_space" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "type"
SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "disk_inodes" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "type" fill(null)
SELECT max("value") FROM "disk_backlog" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT percentile("value", 95) FROM "disk_backlog" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "type" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "net_packets" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "type" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "net_drops" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "type" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "net_drops" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "type" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "ipv4_errors" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "type" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "ipv4_packets" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "type" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "ipv4_errors" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "type" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "ipv4_tcpsock" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "type" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "ipv4_tcphandshake" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "type" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "ipv4_tcperrors" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "type" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "ipv4_udppackets" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "type" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "openio" WHERE "resource" = 'cpu' AND "mode" = 'used' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "mode", "servicetype" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "openio" WHERE "resource" = 'disk' AND "type" = 'read' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "servicetype", "type" fill(null)
SELECT (sum("value") * -1)/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "openio" WHERE "resource" = 'disk' AND "type" = 'write' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "servicetype", "type" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "openio" WHERE "resource" = 'files' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "servicetype" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "openio" WHERE "resource" = 'mem' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "servicetype" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "openio" WHERE "resource" = 'processes' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "servicetype" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "openio" WHERE "resource" = 'threads' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "servicetype" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "openio" WHERE "resource" = 'sockets' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "servicetype" fill(null)

SELECT (sum("value") * -1)/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "openio_log_bandwidth" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type" = 'bytes_sent' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "servicetype" fill(null)

SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "openio_beanstalkd_tubes" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type" =~ /^current.*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "namespace", "tube", "type" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "openio_beanstalkd_tubes" WHERE "type" = 'current_jobs_buried' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "namespace", "tube", "type" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("value"), 10s)/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "openio_beanstalkd_tubes" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type" = 'total_jobs' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "namespace", "type", "tube", "host" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "openio_log_response_codes" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "servicetype", "type" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "openio_log_response_time" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "servicetype", "type" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "openio_log_http_method" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "servicetype", "type" fill(null)

list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM cpu WITH KEY=host

list.name: namespace
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM openio_score WITH KEY=namespace
